event.summary: 07/27/1993: The U.S. Embassy and surrounding area suffered extensive damage when a van containing 200 kilograms of ammonium nitrate fuel oil and dynamite exploded, killing one and injuring six. Authorities suspected that the Shining Path (Sendero Luminoso) was responsible for planting the bomb. No further information was reported.
event.weapdetail: Van containing 200 kilograms of ammonium nitrate fuel oil and dynamite exploded. The van was pushed by perpetrators toward the building.
event.propcomment: The explosion shattered glass and caused fires in the four-story concrete building.
